channel.title: Where in SocialHub Can I Talk about ...?
channel.description:
This is the place where you can ask where is the more appropriate place for a topic you have in mind: maybe there's already an ongoing discussion relevant to that topic, or someone can guide you to the right category.
Here's a [list of top-level categories](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/welcome-to-socialhub/7/1#list-of-top-level-categories) and their purpose.
If you're wondering about a missing category, you reached the right topic: please describe the category you have in mind and why it should be created. Each category requires one or more _hosts_ who will be in charge of organizing, facilitating, and moderating it so that it remains active, relevant, and welcoming.

item.title: Where in SocialHub Can I Talk about ...?
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
Beyond ActivityPub

It was suggested to me that there’s a category missing to invite non-technical talks related to ActivityPub and its milieu. Something that would be welcoming to academics, journalists, and a public curious about the purpose, history and outreach of the ActivityPub community. For example, the following topics could belong there:

  • Articles about ActivityPub
  • Twitter to "develop an open and decentralized standard for social media"
